narrative: Created a narrative spec tying together all existing specifications. This "FTS Integration Story" gives contributors a cohesive overview of how database schemas, RL components, automation, and documentation will converge.
user_input: With all ./specs/* you will create a story that you will name and store adequatly
purpose: Provide a high-level narrative summarizing the specifications for incoming Fractal Trading System features so developers understand the big picture.
future_scene: Developers can reference the story spec to see how each piece fits before diving into individual specs, ensuring a more integrated approach to future pull requests.
